heading: bradley: heart problem
subheading: bill bradley, running hard against al gore for the democratic presidential nomination, was forced to cancel campaign appearances in berkeley, california and washington state after the discovery of an irregular heartbeat, wired news learned friday. the bradley campaign canceled a friday afternoon appearance in berkeley, and his entire saturday schedule, which had him campaigning in washington.
author: wired staff
text: bill bradley, running hard against al gore for the democratic presidential nomination, was forced to cancel campaign appearances in berkeley, california and washington state after the discovery of an irregular heartbeat, wired news learned friday. the bradley campaign canceled a friday afternoon appearance in berkeley, and his entire saturday schedule, which had him campaigning in washington.
